name: MNGO
description: Next-generation ticketing and operations ecosystem for theme parks, museums, attractions, and entertainment venues with AI automation

overview.problem: Legacy ticketing systems (Vivaticket, Accesso, Semnox, Ticketmaster) lack modern architecture, AI automation, and unified operations. Venues struggle with complex configurations, manual processes, and disconnected systems for ticketing, access control, POS, and CRM
overview.valueProposition: Complete venue operating ecosystem with AI-driven configuration, Universal Virtual Ticket Identity (UVTI), microservices architecture, unified POS/B2C/B2B/Access Control, and natural language operations management
overview.strategicImportance: Positions Fuelers to disrupt the $15B+ global ticketing and venue management market with the world's most advanced AI-powered platform, replacing legacy systems across theme parks, museums, and entertainment venues globally

technicalStack.ai: AI Configuration Engine, AI Dynamic Pricing, AI Reporting Assistant

features.name: AI Configuration Assistant
features.description: Natural language event, ticket, and pricing setup

features.name: Universal Virtual Ticket Identity (UVTI)
features.description: Digital identity token with entitlements, wallet, and multi-media support

features.name: Unified POS System
features.description: Single-screen cashier interface for tickets, memberships, and packages

features.name: Access Control & Validation
features.description: QR/RFID/NFC scanning with offline support and anti-passback

features.name: Event & Performance Management
features.description: Timeslots, capacity control, seat maps, and calendar management

features.name: B2C Online Sales
features.description: Mobile-friendly web portal for ticket sales and bookings

features.name: B2B Reseller Portal
features.description: Partner accounts with credit wallets and incentive programs

features.name: Membership & Loyalty
features.description: Tiered memberships, family linking, and loyalty points

features.name: AI Reporting Assistant
features.description: Natural language queries for sales, attendance, and analytics

features.name: Multi-Currency & Multi-Language
features.description: Global-ready with multi-venue, multi-currency, multi-language support

screenshots.title: Event & Performance Management
screenshots.description: POS interface for event selection, calendar management, and ticket type selection

screenshots.title: Payment Processing
screenshots.description: Multi-payment method support with cash, card, wallet, voucher, and split payment options

screenshots.title: Ticket Selection & Shopping Cart
screenshots.description: Visual ticket selection with real-time cart management and member suggestions

diagram.title: MNGO Platform Architecture
diagram.description: Microservices ecosystem for ticketing, POS, access control, and venue operations

costs.note: 2-month project timeline. Initial deposit of AED 47,000 (≈ $12,807 USD) required to start. UI/UX completed in 7-10 days. Backend and Frontend incremental delivery over 2 months.

dependencies: Initial deposit payment to commence work
Hardware vendor partnerships for POS terminals
constraints: 2-month delivery timeline for backend and frontend
UI/UX design must be completed in 7-10 days
Initial deposit required before project start

currentStatus.summary: Project in active development with 40% backend and frontend completion. UI/UX design phase completed. Team of 9 members allocated (4 backend, 2 frontend, 1 Flutter, 2 UI/UX designers). Initial deposit of AED 47,000 (≈ $12,807 USD) required to commence work.

risks.risk: Tight 2-month timeline for backend and frontend completion
risks.mitigation: Incremental delivery approach with 4 backend and 2 frontend developers working full-time, prioritizing core modules first

risks.risk: Initial deposit required before project commencement
risks.mitigation: Clear payment terms: AED 47,000 (≈ $12,807 USD) initial deposit, then AED 47,000 at month 2

risks.risk: Integration complexity with multiple systems (POS, access control, payments)
risks.mitigation: API-first design with dedicated integration testing phase

blockers: Initial deposit payment pending (AED 47,000 ≈ $12,807 USD to start project)
Payment gateway partnership agreements in progress

planned: Complete backend APIs development (4 weeks remaining)
Pilot deployment with test venue (1 week)
